paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for KCNH2, including penetrance data.

patients.phenotype: associated with isolated ventricular non-compaction and long QT syndrome

individual_records.phenotype_details: long QT syndrome with ventricular non-compaction
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Ogawa et al. described one pediatric patient with an A561V mutation in the pore region.

individual_records.phenotype_details: long QT syndrome with ventricular non-compaction
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Ogawa et al. described another with a D501N mutation in the non-pore region.

functional_data.summary: The A561V mutation is located in the pore region of the KCNH2 gene, which is critical for potassium ion conduction.

variants.evidence_level: Moderate evidence based on case reports.
variants.additional_notes: Both mutations are linked to long QT syndrome and isolated ventricular non-compaction.
key_quotes: LVNC has also been observed in conjunction with inherited long QT syndrome secondary to KCNH2 mutations.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for KCNH2 variants were extracted successfully.
